meter_reading.notes: Meter orientation check: BADGER METER text at top, digital display readable left-to-right. White digits (5 digits on left): 0 2 2 7 1 = 2271 m³. Black digit (single digit on right, separated): 4 = 0.4 m³. Red dial analysis: Dial orientation: '0' mark at top of dial, '5' mark at bottom of dial. Dial number scale position: pointing at 5.0, Clock position: 6 o'clock, Degrees: 180° (pointing DOWN), Verification: Hand is pointing DOWN ✓. Dial reading: 180/3600 = 0.050 m³. Total: 2271.45 m³. Note: Image is slightly out of focus making the black digit somewhat difficult to read with full certainty, appears to be 4. Red dial hand clearly pointing at bottom position (5 on scale).
